greeting-description: I'm a student passionate about full-stack development. I love building things that solve real world problems and learning by doing.
greeting-location: A student based in Dobrich, Bulgaria
contact-me-description: Hi! I'm a high school student with a strong interest in software development. I'm currently looking for internship opportunities or small projects where I can learn, grow, and make meaningful contributions.
contact-me-description2: If you're hiring interns, collaborating on tech projects, or just open to connecting, I'd love to hear from you!
contact-me-description3: You can use the form below to get in touch—or reach out via the social buttons if you prefer.
contact-me-description4: Curious about my work? Feel free to check out my GitHub or explore the <projects>Projects</projects> section of this website.
about-description: I'm a high school student passionate about full stack app development. I love building things that are both useful and beautiful, from backend APIs to interactive UIs
about-description2: I've worked primarily with technologies like TypeScript, React, Node.js, and FirebaseDB, but I'm always experimenting with new tools and frameworks. I enjoy both front-end design and back-end logic, and I’m constantly learning to improve my craft.
about-description3: My biggest project so far is <lunge>Lunge</lunge>, a fitness tracker built with <react>React</react>, <node>Node.js</node> and <firebase>Firebase</firebase>. I’ve also worked on other smaller projects, which have helped me dive deeper into <i1>authentication</i1>, <i2>responsive design</i2> and <i3>working with APIs</i3>. In addition to coding, I’ve participated in various regional and national competitions (<u>English & IT</u>), where I've placed in top places and gained valuable experience in problem-solving and work ethic.
